flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=300>>300
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $300 / 2 = $<<300/2=510>>510
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $510 + $10 = $<<510+10=520>>520 to the shelter.
#### 520

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
